description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Whilst the King is away, the evil Count Wharfdale has taken over the realm and its down to you and your lance to fight your way through his armies and finally defeat him.
description.short: Whilst the King is away, the evil Count Wharfdale has taken over the realm and its down to you and your lance to fight your way through his armies and finally defeat him.
